snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio will rent out his Brooklyn townhouse while he and his family live at Gracie Mansion, aides to the mayor said.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio plans to rent out his Park Slope, Brooklyn, townhouse while he and his family live at Gracie Mansion; three-story home will be listed at $4,975 a month.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio will rent out his Brooklyn townhouse while he and his family live at Gracie Mansion, aides to the mayor said.

headline.main: For Rent by de Blasio: 3-Bedroom Home
